definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

dramatic form consisting of historical narration/history as jocular narrative/to stretch history for a joking story/amusing story with strained interpretations of history/to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
to reproduce photographically/to duplicate/to adapt (as a movie)/to remake (a movie)/adaptation/reproduction/remake
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
